Assalāmu `alaikum Warahmatullāhi Wabrakatuh,

 

The Darul Iftaa is aiming to encourage and inspire the upcoming generation in the field of business.  We want our youth to prosper like how their elders have prospered.  Experience and personal accounts have the potential to provide that spark needed to aflame the youth.

 

We humbly request you to forward your personal experiences of how you or your family have climbed the ladder to the top.  What was the key factor or incident which opened the doors to success in the financial world? How did your father or grandfather toil and fare in helping their progeny reach the peaks of achievement?

 

Your experiences will inspire others and will be a means of Sadaqah Jariyah (perpetual reward) for you.

 

Kindly email your experience or the experience of anyone you know of.  You may email us at: admin@daruliftaa.net

 

If you find it difficult to email, you may telephone the Darul Iftaa to relate your experiences on: 031-207-5772 or 072-786-4923.

 

Do state if you wish to remain anonymous.

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
